name: KIA MOTORS AMERICA, INC., Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF the FIRST JUDICIAL DISTRICT OF PENNSYLVANIA, CIVIL TRIAL DIVISION, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Kia Motors America, Inc. v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: KIA MOTORS AMERICA, INC., Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF the FIRST JUDICIAL DISTRICT OF PENNSYLVANIA, CIVIL TRIAL DIVISION, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of April 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, the “Petition for Review (In the Nature of a Writ of Prohibition)” is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
41 A.3d 1288
KIA MOTORS AMERICA, INC., Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF the FIRST JUDICIAL DISTRICT OF PENNSYLVANIA, CIVIL TRIAL DIVISION, Respondent.
No. 44 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 24, 2012.
